Package com.xcoder.easyinsta

Class Instagram

java.lang.Object
com.xcoder.easyinsta.Instagram
public class Instagram extends Object
This is an easy implementation of instagram private api in java. This class include various methods to perform instagram operation like direct messages,adding stories,posting photos,scrapping profile data like posts,followers,followings etc. All the methods runs asynchronously.
Version:
1.5
Author:
Rahil khan

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static Instagram login(@NotNull @NotNull String username, @NotNull @NotNull String password) throws IGLoginException
      Loges in to your instagram account with the provided username and password. If your account has two-factor authentication, then use static loginOrCache() method which takes a Callable<String> as an argument.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the account to log in.
      password - Password of the account associated with this username.
      Throws:
      IGLoginException

    • loginOrCache

      public static Instagram loginOrCache(@NotNull @NotNull File dir, @NotNull @NotNull String username, @NotNull @NotNull String password) throws IGLoginException
      Returns pre-logged in instagram instance from the cache. If no cache exist, It first perform login and then cache it so it can be used in future.
      Parameters:
      dir - The cache directory of the application.
      username - Username of the account
      password - Password of the account
      Returns:
      Instagram instance.
      Throws:
      IGLoginException - If the dir is not a directory or if an IO error occured while serializing/deserializing the class.

    • cache

      public boolean cache(@NotNull @NotNull File dir)
      Caches the current instagram session, Overwrite if already exist. There is no guarantee that it will always cache. It may fail sometimes (0.1% chance)
      Parameters:
      dir - The cache directory of the application.
      Returns:
      true if the cache was successful. false otherwise.

    • isLogin

      public static boolean isLogin(File dir)
      Returns weather the current session is been cached or not. If a session is cached then it is considered logged in, else not.
      Parameters:
      dir - Directory where cache is saved
      Returns:
      true if logged in,false otherwise

    • clearCache

      public void clearCache(@NotNull @NotNull File dir)
      Clears the instagram cache if exist.
      Parameters:
      dir - The directory where cache is stored.

    • profile

      public Instagram.Profile profile()
      Gets the profile of the user. This profile include all the methods related to it.
      Returns:
      Instagram.Profile of the user.

    • feed

      public Instagram.Feed feed()
      Gets your feeds. This feed include all the methods related to your feed.
      Returns:
      Instagram.Feed your home feed

    • direct

      public Instagram.Direct direct()

      Returns:
